item.title: As Gmail Hackers Strike—Can YouTube Support Recover Your Account?
item.description: As users continue to report their Gmail accounts have been hacked, can Team YouTube recover accounts where Google has otherwise failed?

item.title: DeepSeek’s AI Style Matches ChatGPT’s 74 Percent Of The Time—New Study
item.description: The findings from AI detection firm Copyleaks suggest that DeepSeek’s claimed innovation might possibly be a derivation of ChatGPT's outputs.
